text: @WhiteHouse Meanwhile Americans are worried making house payments paying rent feeding their families trying to make ends meet THIS IS A WASTE OF TAXPAYERS MONEY as of today over “1 million cases and 57,862 thousand Deaths.” People are dying from COVID-19 pandemic! https://t.co/Mu1cVijZFf
